skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development is the process of designing and building the parts of a website that users interact with, such as buttons and text boxes. It's also known as client-side development. Html,Css,JavaScript,React Js,Bootstrap.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end developers work on the parts of a website that users can't see, such as the database, servers, and application programming interfaces (APIs) Python, Java, C#, PHP, JavaScript, Golang, C++, SQL, Kotlin, Ruby.

skills.title: DS & Algo
skills.description: Data Structures and Algorithmsis a fundamental part of computer science that helps programmers and software engineers solve problems and build efficient software. DSA is used in many areas of software Development.

skills.title: OOPS
skills.description: Object-oriented programming (OOP) is a programming model that organizes software design around objects, rather than functions and logic. It's a good fit for large, complex, and frequently updated software.
